languages.text: "И эти шепоты будут слышны каждый раз, когда пустотное судно будет оказываться за вуалью. Смирись с этим. Найди опору. Иначе утратишь себя".

traits.locale_text: "И эти шепоты будут слышны каждый раз, когда пустотное судно будет оказываться за вуалью. Смирись с этим. Найди опору. Иначе утратишь себя".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."
languages.original_text: "И эти шепоты будут слышны каждый раз, когда пустотное судно будет оказываться за вуалью. Смирись с этим. Найди опору. Иначе утратишь себя".

traits.locale_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find your support. Or lose yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find your support. Or lose yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ces murmures, vous les entendrez chaque fois que le vaisseau franchira le voile du grand vide. Vous devez apprendre à l'accepter. Trouvez une bouée de sauvetage à laquelle vous raccrocher. Sans quoi, vous disparaîtrez dans les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Ces murmures, vous les entendrez chaque fois que le vaisseau franchira le voile du grand vide. Vous devez apprendre à l'accepter. Trouvez une bouée de sauvetage à laquelle vous raccrocher. Sans quoi, vous disparaîtrez dans les ténèbres. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴォイドシップがヴェールを越えて旅するたびに、こうした囁きを耳にすることになる。受け入れることを学ぶのだ。こういう時のための錨を見つけるのだ。そうでなければ、自分を見失ってしまうだろう」
languages.original_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォイドシップがヴェールを越えて旅するたびに、こうした囁きを耳にすることになる。受け入れることを学ぶのだ。こういう時のための錨を見つけるのだ。そうでなければ、自分を見失ってしまうだろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “每当虚空之船穿越面纱时，你都会听到这些低语。你必须学会接受这个事实，为自己找到稳固的锚点，否则就会彻底迷失。”
languages.original_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."

traits.locale_text: “每当虚空之船穿越面纱时，你都会听到这些低语。你必须学会接受这个事实，为自己找到稳固的锚点，否则就会彻底迷失。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr werdet dieses Flüstern jedes Mal hören, wenn das Raumschiff hinter den Schleier reist. Lernt, das zu akzeptieren. Findet einen Anker für solche Zeiten. Oder Ihr verliert Euch."
languages.original_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet dieses Flüstern jedes Mal hören, wenn das Raumschiff hinter den Schleier reist. Lernt, das zu akzeptieren. Findet einen Anker für solche Zeiten. Oder Ihr verliert Euch."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Oirás esos susurros cada vez que la nave viaje más allá del velo. Aprende a aceptarlo. Busca un ancla que te ayude a mantenerte firme en estos momentos, o acabarás perdido a la deriva».
languages.original_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Oirás esos susurros cada vez que la nave viaje más allá del velo. Aprende a aceptarlo. Busca un ancla que te ayude a mantenerte firme en estos momentos, o acabarás perdido a la deriva».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Uçsuz gemileri, örtünün ötesine her seyahat ettiğinde bu fısıltıları duyarsın. Bunu kabullenmeyi öğreneceksin. Böylesi zamanlarda tutunacak bir dal bulamazsan kendini kaybedersin."
languages.original_text: "You will hear these whispers every time the void vessel travels beyond the veil. Learn to accept this. Find an anchor for such times. Or lose yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Uçsuz gemileri, örtünün ötesine her seyahat ettiğinde bu fısıltıları duyarsın. Bunu kabul etmeyi öğren. Böylesi zamanlarda kendine bir destek bul, yoksa kendini kaybedersin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
